sections.heading: person subject to this code who, with intent to defraud:(1) Falsely makes or alters any signature to, or any part of, any writing which would, if genuine, apparently impose a legal liability on another or change his legal right or liability to his prejudice; or(2) Utters, offers, issues, or transfer
sections.text: person subject to this code who, with intent to defraud:(1) Falsely makes or alters any signature to, or any part of, any writing which would, if genuine, apparently impose a legal liability on another or change his legal right or liability to his prejudice; or(2) Utters, offers, issues, or transfers such a writing, known by him to be so made or altered, is guilty of forgery and shall be punished as a court-martial may direct.SourceLaws 1969, c. 458, ยง 79, p. 1580.
